title: Currently Plat1 ADC looking for support main around the same level :)
body:
Sup guys

I'm a P1 adc main (Diamond last season) who can play all roles and has a very wide champion pool. I adapt to the meta very fast and adapt to my support's playstyle aswell.

My old support stopped playing league and I prefer playing with other people :P

Add me in-game (ExpertStars), we can at least try it out and if it fails, at least we would have given it a shot

Thanks!

(I use discord/skype)

replies.body: d3 smurf and my friend is d4 smufing looking for an adc

Sup Main, not a smurf but add me if you at least want to try out a couple games. Always willing to learn as well.

na.op.gg/summoner/userName=9tt2
